meanings.definition: Happening or done at the most suitable or opportune time.
meanings.sent1: The timeliest arrival of the mail ensured I received my birthday card on time.
meanings.sent2: Her timeliest decision to leave early saved her from getting stuck in traffic.
meanings.sent3: The timeliest reminder to bring an umbrella came right before the downpour.
meanings.sent4: His timeliest intervention prevented a major crisis at work.
meanings.sent5: The timeliest rescue by the lifeguard saved the drowning swimmer's life.

meanings.definition: Occurring at a time that is appropriate or advantageous.
meanings.sent1: The timeliest response to the question impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: Their timeliest decision to invest in the stock market paid off handsomely.
meanings.sent3: The timeliest joke at the party had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The timeliest arrival of the train allowed him to catch his connecting flight.
meanings.sent5: Her timeliest idea for the project impressed the entire team.
